channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD

item.title: Report E-2023110189
item.description:
Report E-2023110189

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-28T18:13:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-07
  • City: JESSUP
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal XJP experienced a UN2810 SLIP-AYD SL 18 release from a 55-gallon metal drum. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 1-gallon of product released to a 1’ x 2’ area of the trailer floor due to a pinhole puncture. The damaged drum and all impacted rags used to clean the release were containerized into an 85-gallon metal overpack. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.
